results.text: This is the day that the Lord has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it.
results.reason: Encourages gratitude and joy in each new day.
results.reflection: Find reasons to rejoice in the gift of each day.

results.text: The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases; his mercies never come to an end; they are new every morning; great is your faithfulness.
results.reason: Highlights the fresh mercies of God every day.
results.reflection: God's faithfulness and love are renewed each morning.

results.text: Therefore do not be anxious about tomorrow, for tomorrow will be anxious for itself. Sufficient for the day is its own trouble.
results.reason: Encourages living one day at a time with trust in God.
results.reflection: Trust God with the worries of each day.

results.text: Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and do not lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make straight your paths.
results.reason: Emphasizes relying on God for guidance and direction.
results.reflection: Find peace in trusting God's plan for each day.

results.text: Making the best use of the time, because the days are evil.
results.reason: Urges us to use our time wisely for God's purposes.
results.reflection: Be intentional in using each day for God's glory.
